translations.translation: So the Great Blast seized hold of them at the break of day.
So they were seized by the mighty blast at break of day;
Then the mighty Blast caught them at sunrise,
An explosion struck them at sunrise.
Therefore the scream overcame them at sunrise.
So the Sayhah overtook them at the time of sunrise.
So the rumbling overtook them (while) entering upon the time of sunrise;
and the Cry seized them at the sunrise,
Then the (Awful) Cry overtook them at the sunrise.
and thereupon the blast [of Our punishment] overtook them at sunrise.
Then the shout took hold of them at the sunrise.
So the Cry seized them at sunrise,
But the (mighty) Blast overtook them before morning,
So As-Saihah (torment - awful cry, etc.) overtook them at the time of sunrise;
At sunrise a dreadful Shout seized them.
So the Blast struck them at sunrise.
So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
[15:73] Then the Cry, the Cry of Gabriel, seized them at sunrise.
Then the (Awful) Cry) of chastisement (overtook them at the sunrise) when the sun was rising.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ولم يقبلوا النصيحة { فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ } الهائلة المهلكة وقت الصبيحة
 حال كونهم { مُشْرِقِينَ } [الحجر: 73] داخلين وقت شروق الشمس

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
قال تعالى: { فأخذتهم الصيحةُ } 
 يعني: صيحة هائلة مهلكة
 قال ابن عطية: هذه الصيحة صيحة الرجعة
 وليست كصيحة ثمود
 هـ
 وقيل: صاح بهم جبريل فأهلكتهم الصيحة
 { مُشْرِقينَ }: داخلين في وقت شروق الشمس فابتدئ هلاكهم بعد الفجر مصبحين
 واستوفى هلاكهم مشرقين
